mdRecord.dcterms:title: University of Virginia: Matriculation, course of instruction, expenses, &c
Matriculation, course of instruction, expenses, &c
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: University of Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 25 x 40 cm. folded to 25 x 20 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed on p. [1]; p. [2]-[3] are blank; addressed on p. [4] to Alexr. C. Garrett Esq., Williamsburg, Va. Postmarked University of Va. Jul. 12.
The faculty names listed are those included in the University Catalogue for the session of 1851/1852.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Broadside 1851 .U55: Gift of E. Sclater Montague.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LD5670.U57 1851: Imperfect; lacks p.[3]-[4]. Date of purchase 11/13/28 written in upper right corner; in chipboard pamphlet binder with Dewey Decimal number. Byrd Fund.
